field.name: grid_num_cols
field.label: Number Of Columns
field.description: number of grid columns

field.name: grid_space_between_cols
field.label: Space Between Columns
field.description: the space between columns

field.name: grid_space_between_rows
field.label: Space Between Rows
field.description: the space between rows

field.name: gridpanel_vertical_scroll
field.label: Scroll Type
field.description: select grid scroll type (direction) - for right, left panels only

field.name: gridpanel_grid_align
field.label: Grid Panel Align
field.description: the align of the thumbnails grid inside the panel

field.name: grid_carousel
field.label: Grid Carousel
field.description: next pane goes to first when last

field.name: gridpanel_background_color
field.label: Grid Panel Background Color
field.description: background color of the grid wrapper, if not set, it will be taken from the css

field.name: gridpanel_padding_border_top
field.label: Grid Panel Padding Top
field.description: padding between the top border of the panel

field.name: gridpanel_padding_border_bottom
field.label: Grid Panel Padding Bottom
field.description: padding between the bottom border of the panel

field.name: gridpanel_padding_border_left
field.label: Grid Panel Padding Left
field.description: padding between the left border of the panel

field.name: gridpanel_padding_border_right
field.label: Grid Panel Padding Right
field.description: padding between the right border of the panel

field.name: gridpanel_arrows_skin
field.label: Grid Panel Arrows Skin
field.description: skin of the arrows

field.name: gridpanel_arrows_align_vert
field.label: Grid Panel Arrows Vertical Align
field.description: vertical align of arrows, to the top and bottom botders, to the grid, or in the middle space.

field.name: gridpanel_arrows_padding_vert
field.label: Grid Panel Arrows Vertical Padding
field.description: padding between the arrows and the grid, in case of middle align, it will be minimal padding

field.name: gridpanel_arrows_align_hor
field.label: Grid Panel Arrows Horizontal Align
field.description: borders, grid, center - horizontal align of arrows, to the left and right botders, to the grid, or in the center space.

field.name: gridpanel_arrows_padding_hor
field.label: Grid Panel Arrows Horizontal Padding
field.description: minimal size from the grid in case of 'borders' and size from the grid in case of 'grid'

field.name: gridpanel_space_between_arrows
field.label: Grid Panel Space Between Arrows
field.description: space between arrows on left / right panel positions and horizontal grids only

field.name: gridpanel_arrows_always_on
field.label: Grid Panel Arrows Always On
field.description: always show arrows even if the grid is one pane only

field.name: gridpanel_enable_handle
field.label: Grid Panel Show Close Handle
field.description: enable grid close handle

field.name: gridpanel_handle_align
field.label: Grid Panel Handle Align
field.description: close handle tip align on the handle bar according panel orientation

field.name: gridpanel_handle_offset
field.label: Grid Panel Handle Offset
field.description: offset of handle bar according the align

field.name: gridpanel_handle_skin
field.label: Grid Panel Handle Skin
field.description: skin of the handle, if empty inherit from gallery skin

field.name: grid_transition_duration
field.label: Grid Transition Duration
field.description: transition of the panes change duration

field.name: grid_transition_easing
field.label: Grid Transition Easing
field.description: transition of the panes change easing function
